channel.title: Changing coords
channel.description: i was wondering like on portals and on the emote tab how do u change the coords that they take you too..help please...thanks

item.title: Changing coords
item.dc:creator: @scootkid scootkid
item.description:
@scootkid wrote:

Well The Easiest Way Is To Open Up client.java and search the X axis coord until you find something that should look like this and match the teleport Coordinates-

teleportToX = X AXIS; teleportToY = Y AXIS;

Hope That Helped, Got Questions Ask Em,
~Scootkid

Read full topic
